title: Holding Onto A Great Company Culture: Johnson Tractor 2012 Dealership of the Year

tasks.task: Establishing a strong work ethic and supporting employees during peak farming seasons.
subtasks: Demonstrating commitment to one's job during busy periods.
Maintaining a flexible schedule to accommodate family responsibilities.
Promoting teamwork and collaboration among staff.
Assisting customers with equipment issues through problem-solving.
Upholding company values of honesty and customer service.

tasks.task: Managing a successful equipment dealership in a rural community.
subtasks: Serving the equipment dealer market for 30 years.
Adapting to the unique demands of the agricultural industry.
Ensuring efficient operations during peak seasons.
Responding to customer needs promptly to minimize downtime.

tasks.task: Adapting to the fast-paced nature of the agricultural sector.
subtasks: Working long hours during spring and fall planting seasons.
Balancing professional obligations with personal commitments.
Encouraging skill development and knowledge sharing among staff.
Recognizing employee hard work and dedication.
